name: Everyone Dies in a Nuclear War
name_original: Everyone Dies in a Nuclear War
description:
I'm learning to use Love2D to make games and while I was making a pseudo-game engine I hadn't made anything "game" like in it yet. So I sat for a couple of hours and hammered out a weird idea I had at work. More of a tutorial than a game it has game elements and can be "played", but your enjoyment will vary.

Controls:

Space/Enter to begin.

Up/Down or W/S to move selector.

Space/Enter to select.

Escape to close.

Enjoy!

Update: Added a few more control options. The game no longer closes when finished and will now reset to the main menu. Added a new character!
